name: Thunkin
description:
Thunkin is a new type of quick play puzzle game. It's simple get the coloured ball in the same color basket.

Sure it is easy at the beginning, but it gets faster and the balls start coming out of multiple locations. How good is your hand eye coordination? can you keep up with the balls?

THUNKIN

Key Features:
- Simple arcade action
- Pick up and play
- Vivid bold pixel graphics
- Easy to play, difficult to be masterful
- Constant free updates with new game play innovations

Already a Fan? Like Thunkin on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for all the latest news
